title: Murder In The Rue St. Ann
description: When sexy gay private eye Chanse MacLeod investigates the financial shenanigans of club promoter Mark Williams, he discovers that not only does Williams have ties to the New Orleans judiciary, he also has ties to Chanse’s lover, Paul—a connection that reveals secrets about Paul’s past that Chanse had never guessed and now wishes he didn’t know. When Paul disappears, it seems his past has caught up with him in a terrifying way. Greg Herren is the author of Murder in the Rue Dauphine , which also features Chanse MacLeod, and Bourbon Street Blues . He lives in New Orleans.
author: Greg Herren
